@sugarsmack100 Don't worry! Nothing is getting "delisted". The contract upgrade is complete, and if you weren't able to migrate your listing you can still do so in the "relist dashboard" found in your account page.

I've done a ton of hackathons and this @ETHGlobal event had by far the most diverse, creative and engaged set of developers I've worked with. #BUIDL is alive and well!

Other cool areas of project development:  
- gaming and land-based NFTs testing new mechanics
- experimentation w degenerative & collaborative NFTs 
- Buyer and seller tools including tools for new communities (chefs, artists, academic papers)
more: https://t.co/GzlDMA5lea

Third place, Spyglass, a tool that puts the massive amounts of data on NFTs to work to better understand trends per collection, rarities and prediction of future demand and floor price. Very cool and can't wait to see it expand to more collections!(https://t.co/we1TcbCDjd)

Second, The-IMR-Experience, an app makes brings your NFT to more immersive mixed reality experiences using  AR and 3D rendering technologies, SnapChat's Lens, and a bunch of other really interesting integration (https://t.co/4tGOre0Cdw)

First, a big congratulations to our 3 winners! 
First place: WatchMyNFT, an iOS app that lets you easily set your watch face to your favorite NFT and authenticate that it's YOUR NFT. (https://t.co/CS5UEgViyW)
